column4: heh i was going to say that in the first reply to mcpancakes but couldn't remember the name of the fs   heh...
haha, same here, brain farts are wicked
i'm old enough to start having part timers i guess...   ;/
haha, i'm not. but i guess "it's all this damn dope"
if ifup doesn't do it, ifconfig without any ip prolly wont either,  but yeah
very true. but if the interfaces file is intact, and it's static, or gets it from dhcp, it should.
agreed, just mentioning another way.. lol

just a note on apt-file   it's good for packages not installed,  but for people with slower connections, the database takes time to update, and if the intent is to search within packages on the system dpkg can do that.
ah, sorry, thank you for the insight.
at least if luddite moves it to the trash can she can restore it... i'm with you, i advise strongly against it
ROFL, i like that one too
